common.secondary: 1/LR, bonus to shapeshift into random CR 1 creature until bonus to end or HP lost

common.secondary: +2 global dmg while flanking

common.secondary: on hit, heal 2 HP (EDIT TO 1)

common.secondary: +2 to escape checks

common.secondary: when downed, +2 global dmg for combat

common.name: 1. Club & Hammer
common.primary: on club/hammer sub hit, target is pushed up to 10' away from you and knocked prone
common.secondary: on club/hammer sub hit, target is pushed up to 5' away from you

common.name: 2. Dart & Knife
common.primary: on dart/knife sub hit, target gets 3 P DoT, stacking until CON save
common.secondary: on dart/knife sub hit, target gets 1 P DoT, stacking until CON save

common.name: 3. Brawling & Shield
common.primary: on brawling/shield sub hit, target makes CON save or blind until CON save
common.secondary: on brawling/shield sub hit, target makes CON save or sluggish until CON save

common.name: 4. Polearm & Spear
common.primary: on polearm/spear sub hit, target gets -3 dmg res until start of your next turn
common.secondary: on polearm/spear sub hit, target gets -1 dmg res until start of your next turn

common.name: 5. Caster
common.primary: on caster sub hit, target has -3 non-phys res until end of your next turn
common.secondary: on caster sub hit, target has -1 non-phys res until end of your next turn

common.name: 6. 1 MYTH DUST
common.primary: on bow/sling sub hit, target takes 3 P dmg for every 5' it moves or is moved/pushed until end of its next turn
common.secondary: on bow/sling sub hit, target takes 1 P dmg for every 5' it moves or is moved/pushed until end of its next turn

common.name: 1. Conjuration
common.primary: your conjuration spells that don't deal dmg on cast are always upcast up to 3 lvls
common.secondary: your conjuration spells that don't deal dmg on cast are always upcast 1 lvl

common.name: 2. Evocation
common.primary: +8 dmg with evocation cantrips
common.secondary: +4 dmg with evocation cantrips

common.name: 3. 1 MYTH DUST
common.primary: +8 to ability checks for abjuration spells
common.secondary: +4 to ability checks for abjuration spells
common.foil: +1 dmg res while concentrating on an abjuration spell

common.name: 4. Transmutation
common.primary: your transmutation spells that don't deal dmg on cast are always upcast up to 3 lvls
common.secondary: your transmutation spells that don't deal dmg on cast are always upcast 1 lvl

common.name: 5. Divination
common.primary: while concentrating on a divination spell, +45' truesight
common.secondary: while concentrating on a divination spell, +30' blindsight
common.foil: +1 dmg res while concentrating on a divination spell

common.name: 6. Enchantment
common.primary: your enchantment spells have +3 to charm DCs
common.secondary: your enchantment spells have +1 to charm DCs
